title: Kaia Gerber recreates mother Cindy Crawford’s 1992 VMA outfit at 18th birthday party
text:
Kaia Gerber has taken a note from her mother, Cindy Crawford’s fashion book by recreating her famous MTV Video Music Awards (VMA's) outfit.

On Friday night, the supermodel stepped out for her 18th birthday party at the Paradise Club in Times Square, New York.

For the occasion, Gerber – who features as October’s British Vogue cover star – wore a bespoke Versace outfit consisting of a black leather mini skirt paired with a sheer bodysuit and strappy heels.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

The model also sported a voluminous bouffant hairstyle and smoky black eye makeup.

The ensemble was reminiscent to the outfit worn by Gerber’s mother to the VMA’s in 1992.

Klum completed the look with a pair of white stiletto heels. Each piece was finished with a succession of crystals. Getty Images for NYFW: The Shows 18/22 Jonathan Cheban Reality TV star Jonathan Cheban attended the Jeremy Scott show wearing a riot vest designed by vintage jacket label Dust of Gods. Cheban paired the top with black denim jeans, patent boots and a checked shirt tied around his waist. Getty Images for NYFW: The Shows 19/22 Indya Moore Moore looks every inch a star in an Oscar de la Renta gown and Beads Byaree earrings at The Daily Front Row Fashion Media Awards, where the Pose actor accepted the award for 'Cover of the Year' alongside Nina Garcia for their appearance in Elle magazine. Getty Images for NYFW: The Shows 22/22 Maye Musk The model wears a striking, royal blue power suit by Valery Kovalska, complete with a white belt and black headpiece. AFP/Getty Images

The Versace design, worn by Crawford, also featured crossover straps, a choker-style fastening and several gold buckles.

Gerber, who has hit headlines in recent years given her uncanny resemblance to her famous mother, updated the look with a large waist belt designed by Versace and matching statement earrings.

Crawford, 53, was also in attendance at Gerber’s birthday party, alongside husband Rande Gerber.

The mother-of two channelled another pop icon, Cher, by opting for a gold beaded headdress and matching bodysuit.

New York Fashion Week regulars Kendall Jenner and Winnie Harlow also stopped by, as well as Leonardo DiCaprio, Alexander Wang, Lourdes Leon, and Brooklyn Beckham.

Gerber, who officially turned 18 on the 3 September, thanked everyone “who kiki’d with us last night” in an Instagram post showing her on stage with performance artist Amanda Lepore.

In a recent interview with British Vogue Gerber spoke about her milestone birthday, saying: “Being 18... means independence. Age is very much so a concept, I think it places a label on you.

”Ever since I was younger people told me I was a really old soul. Because I felt I understood things I never learned.“

Crawford wished her daughter happy birthday on Instagram by sharing a photo from Gerber’s childhood.
description: Kaia Gerber has taken a note from her mother, Cindy Crawford’s fashion book by recreating her famous MTV Video Music Awards (VMA's) outfit.
